title: Relates to the promotion and possession of a sexual performance by a child
summary: Relates to the promotion and possession of a sexual performance by a child; creates various degrees of crimes relating to promotion of an obscene sexual performance by a child, possession of an obscene sexual performance by a child, promoting a sexual performance by a child, and possessing a sexual performance by a child.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to disseminating indecent material to minors in the first degree, promoting and possessing an obscene sexual performance by a child, and promoting and possessing a sexual performance by a child; and to amend the civil rights law, in relation to a child victim's right of privacy
